name: Attack on the Seaside | Voice Over!!!
name_original: Attack on the Seaside | Voice Over!!!
description:
The browser version may/may not display some frames depending on the browser you are using. For a smooth game-play feel free to get the windows version of the game!!! Use of "X" , "Z" and Arrow keys for controls!!! 

Did you like this game?? Try this game too!!

NekoTale:The Prologue: https://hearts-in-two.itch.io/nekotale

LoopOver:The Assassination: https://hearts-in-two.itch.io/loopover

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heartsintwo/

HINT : SO YOU ARE UNABLE TO COMPLETE THE GAME??

Here’s a little help!!

  • Leave the Beach.
  • Get in the Ship!
  • Find the land with a Cave.
  • Go inside the cave and enjoy!!


//Recent updates include:

  • Voice Acting!!
  • UI and Bug fixes.
  • Changes to Map Design.
  • Changes in some dialogues.

//Sneak peek on how I updated everything here:

  • Few hours into the jam I created the base prototype and itch page.
  • Started Updating game every hour and polishing it on the way
  • Drank a lot of fluids to be hydrated all the time.
  • Finally uploaded the game without Voice Over.
  • Started Voice Acting along with my comrades.
  • Voice Acting done and game is Uploaded.

//Do you want to know more?? Feel free to contact me on my socials or drop a comment.
